ajs.gws
Class GameHost

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      ajs.gws.GameHost
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class GameHost
extends java.lang.Thread

Author:
arunjitsingh This class is where each game runs. It initializes CardDeck and keeps track of played cards in a round.

continueGame

private void continueGame(boolean isNewRound)
Continuing the game after a card is played

Parameters:
isNewRound - Whether the round is complete If true, cards are reset, points awarded and the next round starts Otherwise, the other player plays
